data.oai_dc:dc: Parametric sediment echo sounder survey during R/V Heincke cruise HE505 in the German Bight with link to raw data files

Parametric sediment echo sounder data were collected during R/V Heincke cruise HE505 with a Innomar SES-2000 medium. Data recording was executed along 79 parallel profiles in North Sea within German EEZ. The survey speed was ~5 knots. The primary frequency is 100 kHz and the secondary 12 kHz.
CT, DATE/TIME, HE505, HE505-track, Heincke, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, North Sea, Underway cruise track measurements, Uniform resource locator/link to raw data file
